com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.linearsvm

Class LinearSVMModelTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.linearsvm.LinearSVMModelTrainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassificationModelTrainer, ClassificationMultiModelTrainer

    public class LinearSVMModelTrainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClassificationMultiModelTrainer
    Trains a Linear SVM machine learning model for a given CorpusEventStream. Note: if the same feature is encountered multiple times in a feature vector, the value fed to the trainer will be the sum of values for all of the feature occurrences.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

      • getCutoff

        public int getCutoff()
        Description copied from interface: ClassificationModelTrainer
        Statistical cutoff for feature inclusion: features must appear at least this many times to be included in the model. Note that for numeric features, any value > 0 counts as 1 occurrence for cutoff purposes.
        Specified by:
        getCutoff in interface ClassificationModelTrainer
